## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [contextSelector](./prismy.contextselector.md) | Selector to extract the request context |
|  [headersSelector](./prismy.headersselector.md) | A selector to extract the headers of a request |
|  [methodSelector](./prismy.methodselector.md) | Selector to extract the HTTP method from the request |
|  [querySelector](./prismy.queryselector.md) | Selector to extract the parsed query from the request URL |
|  [urlSelector](./prismy.urlselector.md) | Selector for extracting the requested URL |
